label: Heatit Z Water
overview:
• The relay outputs may be used for controlling actuators/valves in a hydronic heating system
  • May be used to control both 24V actuators and 230V actuators
  • Can be used together with a Heatit Z-Temp sensor in each zone
  • DIN rail mounting
  • Works as a Z-Wave repeater
  • Firmware updates (OTA)
  • Available firmware versions (analog/digital inputs)
  • Supports encryption mode: S0, S2 Access Control Class, S2 Authenticated Class, S2 Unauthenticated Class
inclusion: Place your primary controller in Adding Mode by following the manufacturer’s instructions, then activate the add mode on the device by clicking the small button through the little hole, marked with the text “INCLUSION”, in front of the Heatit Z-Water regulator. The Adding Mode is indicated by Heatit Z-Water status LED is blinking until a timeout occurs after 10 seconds or if the module has been added to the Z-Wave network.
exclusion: Place your primary controller in Remov Mode by following the manufacturer’s instructions, then activate the remove mode on the device by clicking the small button through the little hole, marked with the text “INCLUSION”, in front of the Heatit Z-Water regulator. The Remove Mode is indicated by Heatit Z-Water status LED is blinking until a timeout occurs after 10 seconds or if the module has been removed from the Z-Wave network.

parameters.label: Status LED
parameters.overview:
0 LED turned off.

1 LED turned on. (Default)

2 LED flashing at 1 second intervals (½ Hz).

3 LED flashing at ½ second interval (1 Hz).

options.label: LED flashing at 1 second intervals (½ Hz)
LED flashing at ½ second interval (1 Hz)

parameters.label: LED brightness
parameters.description: Configure the percentage of light in the status LED, when the LED is turned on
parameters.overview: Specifies the brightness level of the LED when it is on. Default is 50.

parameters.label: Thermistor type input 1
parameters.description: This parameter decides which kind of thermistor that is connected to the input..
parameters.overview:
0 No thermistor, input is disabled. (Default)

1 10K NTC. (PART NUMBER: TT02-10KC3-93D-3000R-TPH)

parameters.label: Thermistor type input 2
parameters.description: This parameter decides which kind of thermistor that is connected to the input.
parameters.overview:
0 No thermistor, input is disabled. (Default)

1 10K NTC. (PART NUMBER: TT02-10KC3-93D-3000R-TPH)

parameters.label: Thermistor type input 3
parameters.description: This parameter decides which kind of thermistor that is connected to the input.
parameters.overview:
0 No thermistor, input is disabled. (Default)

1 10K NTC. (PART NUMBER: TT02-10KC3-93D-3000R-TPH)

parameters.label: Thermistor type input 4
parameters.description: This parameter decides which kind of thermistor that is connected to the input.
parameters.overview:
0 No thermistor, input is disabled. (Default)

1 10K NTC. (PART NUMBER: TT02-10KC3-93D-3000R-TPH)

parameters.label: Input 1 report interval
parameters.description: Time interval between consecutive temperature reports.
parameters.overview:
0 Reporting of temperatures disabled.

1 - 8640 Multiply with 10 seconds, 10 seconds – 24 hours. Default is 6 (60 seconds)
